project_name.description: Name of project (press enter to use default name). Do not add spaces or any special characters.

artifacts_dest_path.description: Destination path in Databricks where the JAR and other artifacts will be stored (e.g.; /Volumes/main/{{short_name}}/scala_job_test). Note: If you use Volumes, You must create a Volumes first and the path should start with /Volumes

existing_cluster_id.description: Enter the cluster id for an existing cluster or leave empty to create a new cluster

cluster_type.description: Select cluster type: Dedicated or Standard. If Standard, is the JAR allowlisted by the admin for your workspace? (If not, inform admin: https://docs.databricks.com/en/data-governance/unity-catalog/manage-privileges/allowlist.html)
